programme.desc: A man fanatically opposed to gambling battles a Las Vegas one-armed bandit with a malevolent will of its own.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A businessman inexplicably finds his office has become a set for a movie in which he is a character.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck trumpet player is given a second crack at life after being struck down by a truck.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A playwright describes characters into his tape recorder and they materialize before his eyes.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A bad-tempered writer is convinced the machines in his home are conspiring to destroy him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Taking refuge in a European monastery during a storm, a man hears someone howling and is told it's the Devil who is being held prisoner.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A condemned man tries to convince the people around him that everything and everyone is merely part of a recurring nightmare that always ends in his execution.

programme.desc: An airline official tests his theory that a newly arrived but totally empty plane is imaginary-with startling results.

programme.desc: A group of neighbors turns into a hostile mob when they try to invade one family's bomb shelter, believing a UFO attack is imminent.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: At the Dachau concentration camp, a phantom jury of his tortured victims judges a former Nazi.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.desc: An aged recluse hides in her home fearing the arrival of death. With Robert Redford.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An old man goes raccoon hunting with his beloved dog, a hunt from which neither return.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.desc: Newlywed Alex Walker returns to his home and yearns for the days of his childhood.

programme.desc: El comediante Nathan Fielder viaja a Los Ángeles para entrenar actores para su programa.

programme.title: The Rehearsal
programme.desc: Después de una visita de sus padres, Nathan lucha por defender sus valores.

programme.title: The Rehearsal
programme.desc: Nathan Fielder continúa navegando en un mundo incierto al brindarle a la gente común la oportunidad de ensayar sus propias vidas.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: Los espadachines franceses Athos, Porthos y Aramis deberán hacer frente a un maquiavélico plan de Richelieu.

programme.title: The Front Room

programme.title: It Follows

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Varios años después del trágico fallecimiento de su hija, un juguetero que crea muñecas y su mujer alojan en su casa a una enfermera y un grupo de chicas; pero la muñeca Annabelle, poseída por un espíritu, comienza a atacarlas.

programme.title: MaXXXine

programme.title: The Survivor

programme.title: In Time
